results.t: JSONBin.io: JSON Storage & JSON Hosting Service
results.p: JSONBin.io is a free JSON Storage & a JSON Hosting service which is ideal for Web and Mobile apps, and also for JSON Mocking.

results.t: JSON Keeper - Simple JSON Hosting service
results.p: JSON Keeper. A simple JSON store for your mobile and web app. Built using Amber. Made by @shobhitic.

results.t: JSONsilo.com: Free 5 MB JSON Storage & Unlimited requests
results.p: Hassle-free JSON hosting. Streamline JSON file management effortlessly with JSONsilo. Store, access, and share your JSON files with ease.

results.t: Service for hosting JSON files - David Dikman - Medium
results.p: JSONBIN is a service for dead-simple hosting of JSON files. There is an easy an simple way to store JSON data without needing a full backend or server.

results.t: npoint.io - JSON storage with schema validation
results.p: JSON storage bins that won't break your app. Set up a lightweight JSON endpoint in seconds, then add a schema to edit your data safely at any time.

results.t: Need to host few small .txt and .json files for free.
results.p: Tebi has a very generous free plan, plus it is geo-distributed which means that access speed to your file will be fast across the world.

results.t: JsonStorage - free JSON storage and personalization
results.p: Free JSON content storage and personalization. Store, manage, personalize JSON content for your headless website, mobile app, or anything else.
JSONSERVE allows you to store your JSON online for free, without registration. It's like hosting for JSON files. Just paste a JSON object into the text area, ...

results.t: Free JSON storage over HTTP API
results.p: This JSON storage service allows you to store and share JSON bins, and manipulate this data over a simple HTTP API.

results.t: JSON Storage & Hosting Service as a RESTful service
results.p: JSONBin A free JSON Storage & a JSON Hosting service which is ideal for Web and Mobile apps, and also for JSON Mocking
